TEXT.TITLE: RENT-A-CENTER <RENT> SELLS CONVERTIBLE DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Rent-A-Center Inc is raising 35 mln dlrs via an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 with a 5-3/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said sole manager Morgan Stanley and Co Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 40.50 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 25.58 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the issue is rated Ba-3 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and BB-minus by Standard and Poor's Corp. Reuter
